objects.text:
• High Rise Tapered Fit
• Comfortable Stretch Denim
• Five Functional Pockets
• Flattering Silhouette

product_details.description: Gloria Vanderbilt's # 1 selling women's jean in America with over 60 million sold nationwide the Amanda Classic High Rise Tapered Jean. This pant sits at your natural waistline with five fully functional pockets, easy front zipper fly, standard size belt loops for your favorite belt and contoured hips for that comfort fit you've come to love. Pairs great with all tops from fashionable to your basic tee shirt and all footwear from stylish heels and trendy boot to your favorite flats! The Amanda high rise Jean gives you the mid section confidence you want and versatility you need in any wardrobe, perfect to wear to work, attending a class or spending time with friends for family. Available in various colors, prints, embroidery and embellishments. Effortlessly fun and stylish. A versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages. STYLE - high rise jean sits at natural waist with functional pockets, easy zipper fly, belt loops and slight taper leg for the fit you love VERSATILITY - Goes great with all tops from fashionable to basic a T-shirts and all footwear from stylish boots to your favorit shoes. LENGTH - This pant comes in a 31 inch regular/average inseam, 29 inch short inseam and 33 inch long inseam with a 15 inch leg opening. BRAND - Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages. Fabric type - 73% Cotton, 25% Polyester, 2% Spandex ** Care instructions - Machine Wash ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper **

banner_details:
This banner is a fashion promotional layout divided into four quadrants with a diagonal stripe overlay and decorative circular and linear accents. The top-left features a bold heading ("heading") using a modern, uppercase font, followed by a secondary line of text ("subheading") and a tagline ("tagline") with a clean, condensed typeface. The bottom-left includes a set of bullet points ("description") listing product highlights in white text over a dark blue background. Below is a bold price tag ("price") and a rounded rectangular call-to-action button ("cta") with a subtle contrasting fill and strong label. The right side contains a cutout product image ("product_image") slightly overlapping two quadrants for visual depth. The banner uses a clean, modular structure suitable for e-commerce apparel promotions.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #1A365D  
- Royal Blue: #2B4B81  
- Steel Blue: #3D6098  
- Light Gray Blue: #E8EFF9  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Accent Lines: #5773A3 (semi-transparent diagonal elements)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of classic blue jeans styled with a white top and black ballet flats. The dominant color is a rich denim blue (#2F4F88), which blends lighter blue highlights (#5A7BB0) and subtle indigo shadows (#1F3B63) to create depth and texture. The white top (#FFFFFF) enhances contrast, drawing attention to the jeans. The black flats (#1A1A1A) ground the overall look. For an advertising banner, a complementary palette of soft neutrals (e.g., beige #F5F5DC) and accent blues can maintain the focus on the product while keeping the composition elegant and contemporary.
